code: export function getFavoriteRecipes(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('favoriteRecipes'));}export function setFavoriteRecipes(value){return localStorage.setItem('favoriteRecipes',JSON.stringify(value));}export function getRecipeProgress(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('inProgressRecipes'));}export function setRecipeProgress(value){return localStorage.setItem('inProgressRecipes',JSON.stringify(value));}export function getDoneRecipes(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('doneRecipes'));}export function setDoneRecipes(value){return localStorage.setItem('doneRecipes',JSON.stringify(value));}
